name: Project Hypatios
description:
Welcome to
PROJECT HYPATIOS

Welcome to Project Hypatios, a roguelike shooting game where you will play as Subject-420 and face different challenges in a facility filled with enemy robots! Do you have what it takes to beat this game?

GAME OVERVIEW

FACE ENEMIES

Shoot your way through challenging levels by defeating various human-killing robots!

DASH AND RUN

Take advantage of your dashing ability to dodge enemy attacks and run on walls to move through tricky platforms!

MAKE YOUR STRATEGY

Use your ammunition wisely! The amount of ammo you have is crucial to the progress of your gameplay.

PARADOX SHOP

Unlock shortcuts and gain supernatural abilities to have significant advantage during your run. These advantages range from gaining passive healing, more souls per enemy, unlocking a corridor that leads to a secret room/passage, or teleporting into another level.

CREDITS - FerryCafe Studio

  1. Ferry - Supervisor
  2. Angeline Cecilia - Team Manager and 2D Artist
  3. Daniel Emerald Sumarly - Game Designer
  4. Kevin Miguel Tanadi - Programmer
  5. Patrick Jason Wongso - 3D Artist and Programmer
  6. Arkannabil Pratama - Sound Engineer
